biotools.summary: pksensi is an R package that implements the global sensitivity analysis workflow to investigate the parameter uncertainty and sensitivity in physiologically based kinetic (PK) models, especially the physiologically based pharmacokinetic toxicokinetic model with multivariate outputs. An R package to apply global sensitivity analysis in physiologically based kinetic modeling.

bioschemas.name: pksensi
